rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, hi there, Adel-sama! May I
beg a moment of your attention?
It's a rather perplexing matter.

rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0002
rows.name:
There's a really dangerous-looking
cave here in Aletta...

rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You can't get in at the moment,
but there's a curious depression
of the sealed entrance.

rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Doesn't it bother you,
knowing that it's there and
not being able to get in?!

rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I mean, I have no idea what kind
of key-like object would fit in
the depression. Perhaps none.

rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Yet surely, it'll be brim-full with
treasure. And anyone able to open it
would claim it for themselves...

rows.label: tlk70000050_02_msg0007
rows.name:
Just imagine how much food I could
buy with a heap of treasure! Even
thinking about it is making me drool.
